name: Gmail - Icons for S/Mime Messages
description:
Add icons to your S/Mime signed (a certificate) and encrypted (a padlock) messages in Gmail.

Merged two separate S/Mime Icon userscripts and updated for compatibility with recent Gmail changes.
style 464 and style 465 by user 357

Even for those not using encrypted S/Mime messaging in Gmail [Extension by Richard Jones at https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/592/ ]

Goes great with style 3958 by user 74
